patthana10.5:1.1: Nakusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.5:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana10.5:3.1: Nakusalaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana10.5:4.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.5:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.5:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana10.5:7.1: Nakusalaṃ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.5:8.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana10.5:9.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana10.5:10.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana10.5:11.1: Nakusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana10.5:12.1: Nakusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
